Package io.github.mountainrange.mule.controllers

Contains JavaFX controllers to display information about the game state.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    SceneAgent
    Interface for controllers to work with SceneLoader.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AboutController
    Controller for the "About MULE" screen.
    AssayOfficeController
    Controller for the Assay Office (currently unimplemented).
    AuctionController
    Controller for auction screen.
    ControlsController
    Controller for controls screen.
    CreditsController
    Controller for credits screen.
    GameConfigController
    A controller to manage Game config
    LandOfficeController
    Controller for the land office.
    MainController
    Controller to manage the first pane we see
    MenuBarController
    Controller for the top menu bar.
    OptionsController
    Controller for the options dialog
    PlayController
    A class to manage the main Playing Map Screen All interactions with the playing JavaFX Canvas are managed through here.
    PlayerConfigController
    Controller for the player configuration section of the game configuration.
    PubController
    Controller for the pub screen.
    StoreController
    Controller for the store screen.
    TownController
    Controller for the main town screen.

Package io.github.mountainrange.mule.controllers Description

Contains JavaFX controllers to display information about the game state.
